Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: CJ "area526"
Reviews.Content: I have the 8ch system, but same setup. It's a really great DVR & takes up very lil room. The company GW Security is a pretty good co. & respond to emails pretty quick. I've has several problems in learning how to do some advanced set ups & the company has been very helpful.Instead of me listing all the pros of this unit, just read the specs sheet real careful....it a truly professional setup. I had this system for quite awhile now & honestly....I cannot think of a single Con about it. My only problem is I should've got the 16ch instead. Think about that when your purchasing. How many cameras will you need in 6-9 months. The system was so good, I ended up putting up cameras everywhere. Even at the pool so I can watch the Creepy cleaner in the pool....make sure it doesn't get hung-up. I highly recommend this system ....when you buy one, go one size bigger if you can. You won't regret the decision to spend the extra money.I've had surveillance systems since 1984 & this is the best I've ever had.
